medical_history.chief_complaint: Upper quadrant pain after eating a large fatty meal.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began two hours after eating, was constant with periods of intense pain, and resolved suddenly about one hour ago. No factors were identified that aggravated or relieved the pain.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had her gallbladder removed; Grandmother had pancreatic cancer; Father had colon cancer.
